entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS, BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
